room_title: Escape room "The Cellar" by Key Quest in Boston
review: 2nd time I believe that I've been there I simply love for group events and it's so much fun

room_title: Escape room "The Cellar" by Key Quest in Boston
review: Went there for a bachelor party and had a TON of fun (in spite of my body not being up for combat with 10 year olds). Great arena, well organized.

room_title: Escape room "The Cellar" by Key Quest in Boston
review: Scary, but not too scary. More like the atmosphere is a little haunting, so don't worry if you want to bring kids. My sons 16 and 14 yo had fun. I think I was more scared than they were.
